resources.string: The Master Mode adds the other players, sets up the game and starts it. The master can play the quiz as well. You need exactly one person with master mode per game.
The Player plays the game without setting up anything. You press this button and wait until the master starts the game.
You can add players that are in the same Wi-Fi Direct network as you to a game.
You are not the group owner
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Questions( Question VARCHAR, Answer0 VARCHAR, Answer1 VARCHAR, Answer2 VARCHAR, Answer3 VARCHAR, rightAnswer INTEGER, Category INTEGER REFERENCES Categories (rowid) );
Please wait for the master player to start the game.
While you wait, you can take a look at the rules:

Every player will see a question at the same time. The one who clicks the right answer first will gain a point. \nIf you chose the wrong answer, you lose a point and are not allowed to give an answer to this question again. \nThere is a Timer of 10seconds for every question. If it is over, you are not allowed to answer to this question anymore.
Here is a list of players that are already registert (by clicking Player). If you see everyone you want to play with, you can Start the Game
